# f5distributedcloud_role (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_role` resource manages Roles in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Roles define permissions for accessing and managing resources within the F5 XC platform.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_role" "viewer" {
  name        = "viewer-role"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Read-only access role"
  role_type   = "CUSTOM"

  permissions {
    resource   = "namespace"
    operations = ["read"]
  }

  permissions {
    resource   = "origin_pool"
    operations = ["read", "list"]
  }
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `permissions` (Block List) Permission definitions for the role. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--permissions))
- `role_type` (String) Type of role (CUSTOM, PREDEFINED).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--permissions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `permissions`

Required:

- `operations` (List of String) Operations allowed (read, write, delete, list).
- `resource` (String) Resource type to grant permissions on.
